long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly access your team's knowledge directly from your browser. See AskX in any new tab to seamlessly search and retrieve information from your connected tools.

Key Features
- Get instant access to AskX in any new tab to seamlessly search and retrieve information from your connected tools.
- Quick access to AskX from any web page with "Cmd/ctrl + Shift + K" or by hitting the extension button.

Enhance your productivity by having your team's collective knowledge at your fingertips, right within your web browser.
